# QueryResult.Iterator

**Structure**

The type of iterator used for entity query results.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Iterator
```

## Advancing the iterator

- **next()**: Advances to the next entity and returns it.

## Creating an iterator

- **makeIterator()**: Returns an iterator for the contained entities.

## Conforms To

- IteratorProtocol

items.description: Advances to the next entity and returns it.
items.name: next()

items.description: Returns an iterator for the contained entities.
items.name: makeIterator()
